extendedInfo.description: Need to find out the truth?Want to know if your friends are lying to you?Well now you can find out with the most accurate Lie Detector app available.Using our amazing Lithium Infrared Emitter technology, you can finally find out the important information you always wanted to know about your family, girlfriend/boyfriend and best friends!Questions like:â Have you ever made out with a member of the same sex?â Have you ever been in a fist fight?â Have you ever laughed until something you were drinking came out your nose?â Have you ever made love to anything not human?â Plus MANY more!CREATE YOUR OWN TEST!In addition to our huge database of questions you can also add your own.Want to find out something specific about a person, create your own set of probing questions!Add as many questions as you want and really find out everything you ever wanted to know about your victim.Become the seeker of truth â download Lie Detector today!Please note this app is purely for entertainment purposes, not suitable for settling civil or criminal lawsuits or interrogating evil dictators.
